Title: Includes implantable infusion pumps for chronic non-cancer pain management as standard coverage for medical assistance
Summary: Includes implantable infusion pumps for chronic non-cancer pain management as standard coverage for medical assistance.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to including implantable infusion pumps for chronic non-cancer pain management as standard coverage for medical assistance
